snippet.title: Game Play Showcase - "Ticking Tea Time" I AGENTS HONK
snippet.description:
The Hesperia Express glided into the Westside platform, its arrival marked by a sense of quiet tension that seemed to seep into the very air.

In the shadows of the Cold War's ever-present chill, whispers swirled through the streets and alleys, carrying unsettling news: “A massive bomb lies hidden somewhere on the Eastside—”

As an esteemed investigator, you are tasked with an urgent and covert mission. Disguised as a waiter, you must navigate the opulent confines of the train and seek out the elusive spy concealed among the elite VIP passengers.

Who is the shadowy figure behind the plot? What damning evidence will reveal their identity? And where, precisely, is the bomb hidden?

Save the fate of the Eastside in---

{ TICKING TEA TIME }

Now Available for free :
https://maijingmaichai.itch.io/ticking-tea-time

BIDC Rising Star Award for Game Winning 2024

© AGENTS HONK., All Right Reserved.
